title: Panels: Use these to manage what content displays on this page.

fields.label: Content Panels
fields.name: content_panels
fields.instructions: Add panels here by clicking the "Add New Panel" button at the bottom right side. Panel order can be changed by dragging each up or down.

sub_fields.label: Active/Inactive
sub_fields.name: activeinactive
sub_fields.instructions: This adds a floating banner to buy tickets.

sub_fields.label: Buy Ticket URL
sub_fields.name: buy_ticket_url
sub_fields.instructions: Required. Enter the URL to the ticket purchasing page for this faire.

sub_fields.label: Buy Ticket Text
sub_fields.name: buy_ticket_text
sub_fields.instructions:
Please enter the text displayed in the 'Buy Ticket' Flag.
20 character limit.

sub_fields.label: Active/Inactive
sub_fields.name: activeinactive
sub_fields.instructions: This adds a flag banner that can be used to separate panels.

sub_fields.label: Active/Inactive
sub_fields.name: activeinactive
sub_fields.instructions: This adds an email sign up form for newsletter subscriptions.

sub_fields.label: Newsletter Text
sub_fields.name: newsletter_panel_text
sub_fields.instructions:
Please enter the text displayed on the left side of the panel.
100 character limit.

sub_fields.label: Content
sub_fields.name: column_1
sub_fields.instructions: Use the editor to style this content block however you like.

sub_fields.label: Active/Inactive
sub_fields.name: activeinactive
sub_fields.instructions: Activate or Inactivate this panel

sub_fields.label: CTA Button Text
sub_fields.name: cta_button
sub_fields.instructions: Optional Call To Action button to add underneath the content. i.e. "Learn More" or "Buy Now". Leave blank to hide.

sub_fields.label: CTA Button Text
sub_fields.name: cta_button
sub_fields.instructions: Optional Call To Action button to add underneath the content. i.e. "Learn More" or "Buy Now". Leave blank to hide.

sub_fields.label: Active/Inactive
sub_fields.name: activeinactive
sub_fields.instructions: Activate or Inactivate this panel

sub_fields.label: Featured Items
sub_fields.name: featured_makers
sub_fields.instructions: Adds a panel for 1-3 rows of featured items. Each item features an image, name, and short description. Start by clicking the "Add New Item" button for each featured item to show in this panel.

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: maker_image
sub_fields.instructions: Images are best when square sizes around 500px x 500px.

sub_fields.label: Name
sub_fields.name: maker_name
sub_fields.instructions: Optional field. 40 character limit.

sub_fields.label: Short Description
sub_fields.name: maker_short_description
sub_fields.instructions: Optional field. 300 character limit.

sub_fields.label: More Info URL
sub_fields.name: more_info_url
sub_fields.instructions: Optional link to more information. Leave URL field blank to hide.

sub_fields.label: Text
sub_fields.name: cta_text
sub_fields.instructions: Type the CTA link text here. 30 character limit.

sub_fields.label: CTA Link
sub_fields.name: cta_url
sub_fields.instructions: Optional button to link to a page with more items. Leave URL field blank to hide.

sub_fields.label: Background Color
sub_fields.name: background_color
sub_fields.instructions: Background color of this panel. Choose White, Blue, Dark Blue, Grey or Dark Grey

sub_fields.label: Amount of Items to show
sub_fields.name: makers_to_show
sub_fields.instructions: Show 3, 6, or 9 featured items

sub_fields.label: Active/Inactive
sub_fields.name: activeinactive
sub_fields.instructions: Activate or Inactivate this panel

sub_fields.label: Panel Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: i.e. "Featured Items"

sub_fields.label: Number of Makers to show
sub_fields.name: makers_to_show
sub_fields.instructions: Show 3, 6, or 9 Makers

sub_fields.label: Text
sub_fields.name: cta_text
sub_fields.instructions: Type the CTA link text here. 50 character limit.

sub_fields.label: CTA Link
sub_fields.name: cta_url
sub_fields.instructions: Optional button to link to a page with more makers. Leave URL field blank to hide.

sub_fields.label: Background Color
sub_fields.name: background_color
sub_fields.instructions: Background color of this panel. Choose White, Blue, Dark Blue, Grey or Dark Grey

sub_fields.label: Enter formid here
sub_fields.name: enter_formid_here
sub_fields.instructions: Enter the form to pull featured individuals from. They must have the 'Featured Maker' flag set to be pulled in.

sub_fields.label: Active/Inactive
sub_fields.name: activeinactive
sub_fields.instructions: Activate or Inactivate this panel

sub_fields.label: Panel Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: i.e. "Featured Makers"

sub_fields.label: Text
sub_fields.name: sponsors_page_year
sub_fields.instructions: Type the 4 digit year of the faire here. 4 character limit.

sub_fields.label: Active/Inactive
sub_fields.name: activeinactive
sub_fields.instructions: Activate or Inactivate this panel

sub_fields.label: Sponsors Page URL
sub_fields.name: sponsors_page_url
sub_fields.instructions: This is used for pulling in the sponsor data for this faire.

sub_fields.label: Text
sub_fields.name: text
sub_fields.instructions: Type the CTA message here. 50 character limit.

sub_fields.label: Active/Inactive
sub_fields.name: activeinactive
sub_fields.instructions: Activate or Inactivate this panel

sub_fields.label: Background Color
sub_fields.name: background_color
sub_fields.instructions: Background color of this panel. Choose blue, light blue, red or orange.

sub_fields.label: Active/Inactive
sub_fields.name: activeinactive
sub_fields.instructions: Activate or Inactivate this panel

sub_fields.label: Background Color
sub_fields.name: background_color
sub_fields.instructions: Background color of this panel. Choose blue, light blue, red or orange.

sub_fields.label: Hero image Repeater
sub_fields.name: hero_image_repeater
sub_fields.instructions:
Upload 1-10 images for use as the hero image on the page. The displayed image will be randomly selected from these.
Optimal size is 1920 x 490

sub_fields.label: Image Link
sub_fields.name: image_cta
sub_fields.instructions: Optional - If supplied, this will make the image a clickable link.

sub_fields.label: Active/Inactive
sub_fields.name: activeinactive
sub_fields.instructions: Activate or Inactivate this panel

sub_fields.label: Hero Title
sub_fields.name: column_title
sub_fields.instructions: This title is displayed over the content with a semi transparent white background

choices.list: List of items with optional links

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: column_image_field
sub_fields.instructions: Upload an image

sub_fields.label: Image Link
sub_fields.name: image_cta
sub_fields.instructions: Optional - If supplied, this will make the image a clickable link.

sub_fields.label: Link Text
sub_fields.name: image_cta_text
sub_fields.instructions: Optional - If supplied, an additional link is displayed below the image using this text.

sub_fields.label: Paragraph
sub_fields.name: column_paragraph
sub_fields.instructions: Character limit is 350

sub_fields.label: List fields
sub_fields.name: column_list_fields
sub_fields.instructions: Enter in your list items and (if appropriate) their urls (maximum of 5)

sub_fields.label: Panel Title
sub_fields.name: panel_title
sub_fields.instructions: Optional: 50 character limit.

sub_fields.label: Panel Title
sub_fields.name: panel_title
sub_fields.instructions: Optional: 50 character limit.

sub_fields.label: Padding
sub_fields.name: padding
sub_fields.instructions: Whether the columns should have padding

sub_fields.label: Image Height
sub_fields.name: image_height
sub_fields.instructions: Default height of container image will be fit into

sub_fields.label: Link Position
sub_fields.name: link_position
sub_fields.instructions: Whether the link text should appear above or below the image

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: column_image_field
sub_fields.instructions: Upload an image; will be cropped to center

sub_fields.label: Image Link
sub_fields.name: image_cta
sub_fields.instructions: Optional - If supplied, this will make the image a clickable link.

sub_fields.label: Link Text
sub_fields.name: image_cta_text
sub_fields.instructions: Optional - If supplied, an additional link is displayed below the image using this text.

sub_fields.label: Button Color
sub_fields.name: button_color
sub_fields.instructions: Select the color of the button (default is blue)

sub_fields.label: Open link in new tab?
sub_fields.name: open_link_in_new_tab
sub_fields.instructions: Check to open link in new tab, uncheck to stay within same tab

sub_fields.label: Background Color
sub_fields.name: background_color
sub_fields.instructions: Select a color for the banner ba

sub_fields.label: Link URL
sub_fields.name: link_url
sub_fields.instructions: The link URL. For example, "/map/"

sub_fields.label: Active/Inactive
sub_fields.name: activeinactive
sub_fields.instructions: Activate or Inactivate this panel

sub_fields.label: Video Title
sub_fields.name: video_title
sub_fields.instructions: Title that appears on the text side

sub_fields.label: Video Text
sub_fields.name: video_text
sub_fields.instructions: Text appears under title

sub_fields.label: Video Button Link
sub_fields.name: video_button_link
sub_fields.instructions: Link under text

sub_fields.label: Video Button Text
sub_fields.name: video_button_text
sub_fields.instructions: The text for the link

sub_fields.label: Video Code
sub_fields.name: video_code
sub_fields.instructions: Youtube video code determines what video to show

sub_fields.label: Active/Inactive
sub_fields.name: activeinactive
sub_fields.instructions: Activate or Inactivate this panel

sub_fields.label: Image Links
sub_fields.name: image_links
sub_fields.instructions: Optional links that will appear under the text to the side of the image

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: Images MUST be at least 1240px wide, no more than 650px tall

sub_fields.label: Image Overlay
sub_fields.name: image_overlay
sub_fields.instructions: Totally optional, if link is provided and not text, link will be for the image itself

sub_fields.label: Background Color
sub_fields.name: background_color
sub_fields.instructions: The color of the background of this row

sub_fields.label: Slideshow Name
sub_fields.name: slideshow_name
sub_fields.instructions: Unique Identifier for the slideshow (don't use any spaces)

sub_fields.label: Slide
sub_fields.name: slide
sub_fields.instructions: Add as many slides as you want

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: Background Image for the entire slide

sub_fields.label: Slide Link
sub_fields.name: slide_link
sub_fields.instructions: Link can be applied to body of slide or just to button

sub_fields.label: Slide Button Color
sub_fields.name: slide_button_color
sub_fields.instructions: Select the color of the button (default is blue)

sub_fields.label: Slide Text
sub_fields.name: slide_text
sub_fields.instructions: Optional slide text to show up for one column slides

sub_fields.label: Background Color
sub_fields.name: background_color
sub_fields.instructions: Select the background color for behind the slideshow

sub_fields.label: Text Position
sub_fields.name: text_position
sub_fields.instructions: Choose where the name of the slide appears (top, bottom or center)

sub_fields.label: Column Number
sub_fields.name: column_number
sub_fields.instructions: Choose a number of columns to show up in this slide show (max 4)

sub_fields.label: Active/Inactive
sub_fields.name: activeinactive
sub_fields.instructions: Activate or Inactivate this panel

sub_fields.label: Slideshow Title
sub_fields.name: slideshow_title
sub_fields.instructions: Optional header to appear above Slideshow

sub_fields.label: Active/Inactive
sub_fields.name: activeinactive
sub_fields.instructions: Activate or Inactivate this panel

sub_fields.label: Feed Tag
sub_fields.name: feed_tag
sub_fields.instructions: Tag of the makezine feed to pull from. Leave blank to pull from all recent makezine articles.

sub_fields.label: More Link
sub_fields.name: more_link
sub_fields.instructions: Optional more link (if blank no button will appear under the feed)

sub_fields.label: Number
sub_fields.name: number
sub_fields.instructions: Number of feed items to show (defaults to 6)

sub_fields.label: Active/Inactive
sub_fields.name: activeinactive
sub_fields.instructions: Activate or Inactivate this panel
